name: Mitigation Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker used a command-line interface to execute malicious scripts and establish a backdoor connection.

parallel--a98d5d3b-a77c-4c06-9f66-534e55.name: Parallel Mitigation Actions
parallel--a98d5d3b-a77c-4c06-9f66-534e55.description: Execute mitigation actions in parallel to handle the incident effectively.

action--f73c16d3-e12a-4b5b-8065-c3ff75d6.name: Kill malicious process
action--f73c16d3-e12a-4b5b-8065-c3ff75d6.description: Terminate the process running the malicious script.

action--b6f28f50-8456-4576-bbe2-09c712d5.name: Delete dropped malware file
action--b6f28f50-8456-4576-bbe2-09c712d5.description: Remove the malware file dropped in the system directory.

loop--c42d7f23-ce15-4ae9-b147-4b1ff835ef.name: System Scan Loop
loop--c42d7f23-ce15-4ae9-b147-4b1ff835ef.description: Run a full system scan until the system is confirmed clean.

is_scan_clean.description: Stores if the system scan was successful without malware detected.

action--f0a7e783-3c9c-4d4a-b737-1f1e3829.name: Run a full system scan
action--f0a7e783-3c9c-4d4a-b737-1f1e3829.description: Perform a full system scan and attempt to remove any remaining threats.

is_scan_clean.description: Indicates if the last scan found any threats.
